topic.title: Site Manager Save Error Sites Not Found
topic.body: I have tried almost everything to fix this issue. I have been trying to add a site with sample HTML - "Hello World," but I haven't been able to sign it yet. It still says sites not found. I have tried updating. But, if I bypass sign and go to Publish directly, my website each time says 1 file not updated. So, please if you already have a site here, help me out. I am using Windows 10.
